problem_type: Student drags a single fraction label or places a point at the correct position beyond 1 on a pre-partitioned number line (varied denominators)
workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2, pre-partitioned with tick marks at thirds (0, 1/3, 2/3, 1, 4/3, 5/3, 2). Labels at 0, 1, and 2. Drag palette with fraction label 4/3.
prompt: Place four-thirds on the number line.
